channel.title: How to change the admin/mod crowns?
channel.description:
i actually have 2 questions for you people today!!
Base: Allstarscape V2
#1 How would i change the mod/admin crowns?
#2 and how could i add more staff positions(like ranks i.e. Sup. Mod , Donator Etc...)?

item.title: How to change the admin/mod crowns?
item.dc:creator: @xpatx xpatx
item.description:
@xpatx wrote:

Custom crowns are loaded through the client. You must load the sprite. I would recommend reading a tutorial for that.

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the admin/mod crowns?

item.title: How to change the admin/mod crowns?
item.dc:creator: @toomuchmopar toomuchmopar
item.description:
@toomuchmopar wrote:

Are you trying to add an ‘admin/mod’ called donator, and it has its special ‘crown’ ?
And… are you trying to…

A)change colors of crowns
B)Make a special crown like in Pwnscape or something like that?

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the admin/mod crowns?

item.title: How to change the admin/mod crowns?
item.dc:creator: @Valhalla95 Valhalla95
item.description:
@Valhalla95 wrote:

[quote=“undertaxxx, post:2, topic:285390”]#1 Changing crowns?

Please tell me exacly what you mean… If it’s like changing the colour or adding new ones, that’s in the client.

#2 adding didderent ranks/status/etc…

I’m not quiet sure… but try searching all your files for the admin/mod code. Under that add like a 3rd or 4th, idk.

I can’t really answer cause i dont understand your questions… :/[/quote]
well i dont have a client…and id like one but im server base lol
and id rather have a tutorial

Read full topic
item.source: How to change the admin/mod crowns?

item.title: How to change the admin/mod crowns?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

if (playa.playerRights == 5) { title = "Donator, "; }

case 5: //Donator. premium = true; donator = 1; break;

Something of that nature?
